title: Standing Up to Wokeness Is Working | 5/3/21
description:
Antifa put out video threatening Portland Mayor Ted Wheeler, and the FBI is now investigating it. Caitlyn Jenner argues biological boys shouldn’t compete in girls’ sports. Mitt Romney was booed at a GOP convention in Utah. Glenn gives some good news on Southlake, Texas, parents’ fight against critical race theory entering their schools. After conservative boycotts, Coca-Cola seems to be distancing itself from wokeness. A college football coach was fired after mocking Stacey Abrams. Glenn explains the “Cobra effect” and how the prices of goods are already rising dramatically. President Biden claimed he will still wear a mask outdoors with other vaccinated people. Is that helping convince anyone to get vaccinated?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
